greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest prime divisor of Catalan number A000108(n), with a(0) = a(1) = 1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
program: (PARI) A152765(n) = if(n<2,1,my(c=binomial(2*n, n)/(n+1)); forprime(p=2, oo, if(!(c%p),return(p)))); \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 12 2019
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Dec 15 2008, Jan 03 2009
ext: Terms a(0) = a(1) = 1 prepended and more terms added by _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 12 2019
